DescriptionMe: My name is Tardy Jimmy, and I live in France. I started to learn about development through the "Computer Science" training at the IUT2 in Grenoble. Thirsty to learn in this field, I continued my training in L3 Computer Science and then I hope to get a master's degree. I like to experiment, discover and learn new technologies. In this portfolio that I made, I present my skills, my career path and my different projects
ConclusionDescription: By dint of experience, coding has become passion.
DevelopEchec: During my college years, I was champion of departmental chess and in the top 5 of the regions for 4 years. I then took a break to resume during the first confinement.
EchecFight: If you want to face me, and you like defeats, add me on the following applications:
DevelopBasket: During my years in high school, I played basket a lot with friends without being in a club. I enrolled from my graduate studies, where I was active (in a club) until the first confinement.
DevelopSeriesMangas: I am a real manga enthusiast and animated of all kinds: nekketsu, seinen etc. I am not left out on series either, I appreciate: fantastic, humorous, science fiction etc.
